name: GambleGame by Criepstar
description:
This is my first game, that I made alone, so it isn't the best.

It's a roulette alike game, so you start with 50 coins and you can choose your stake. The game will than randomly decide if you've won or lost your stake(33,3% chance of winning and 66,6% chance of losing)

I hope you have fun with it and I hope you write some comments!

Hamana,                                                                                                                                                                           Criepstar
